name: Advanced Helicopter Concepts
about: Advanced Helicopter Concepts, located at Frederick Municipal Airport in Maryland, offers comprehensive helicopter and fixed-wing training programs. We provide certifications including Private Pilot Certificate, Commercial Pilot Certificate, and Flight Instructor ratings. Our facility at 330 Aviation Way, Unit E, is equipped to take students from the initial stages to advanced levels of aviation training. We have a partnership with the Community College of Baltimore County, enabling us to offer programs that are eligible for Post 9/11 GI Bill benefits. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities ensure a high-quality learning environment for all students. Advanced Helicopter Concepts is committed to helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation goals.
services:
